entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test helpers which run analyzers and suppressors may be duplicating logic from implementation #62652
  • Fix all warnings and errors set in EditorConfig should be the default setting in Code Cleanup #62651
  • Add CSharpSyntaxVisitor<TArgument, TResult> and CSharpSyntaxRewriter<TArgument> #62647
  • SimplifyTypeNamesDiagnosticAnalyzerBase should sub-type AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62639
    Backlog
  • AbstractRemoveUnnecessaryImportsDiagnosticAnalyzer should sub-type AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62638
    Backlog

Closed

  • Can Source Generators support dotnet6? #62414
  • Visual Studio inserting // into C# comments #62380
    17.4
  • Public API for "Compiler needs to declaratively fail when loading newer analyzers" #62583
  • Missing error for invalid 'scoped' modifier on return type (including no errors in C# 10) #62645
  • Invalid cast exception when using "or" for compatible types in pattern matching in a switch expression #62640

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove dependency on Microsoft.VisualStudio.RemoteControl assembly from Features #62655
    Area-IDE
  • Keep selection on rename invocation #62654
    Area-IDE
  • Block constant and relational pattern matching on types inheriting from or constrained to INumberBase<T> #62653
    Area-Compilers
  • Add IWorkspaceProjectContextFactory F# wappers #62646
    Area-IDE
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressable errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62637
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Use secondary buffer in contained language file paths #62488
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.txt and Signing.props for StructuredLogger #62628
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62650
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Bind IterationErrorVariable to a natural type for error recovery #62601
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1879666 #62626
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62642
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62644
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62643
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62629
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62634
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62636
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cleanup: remove VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl.TryGetContainedDocument #62616
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62630
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62632
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62631
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address feedback on the "references newer compiler" diagnostic in the analyzer loader #62627
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers
  • Infrastructure/build optimizations #62336
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62584
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #62171
    Area-IDE
  • Apply changes directly to text buffer - take 2 #62617
    Area-IDE
  • First steps of the hovering feature and simple test case #62569
    Community
  • Clear ValueTracking on solution close #61815
    Area-IDE
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add array initialization optimization #62392
    Area-Compilers
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Move the option based fading logic to the diagnostic classification t… #62562
    Area-IDE
  • Make static respect modifier order #61289
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers
